IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE SANNEH FOUNDATION IS TO EMPOWER YOUTH BY SUPPORTING AND PROMOTING EDUCATIONAL ATTAINMENT THROUGH IN-SCHOOL AND AFTER-SCHOOL ACADEMIC SUPPORT, IMPROVE LIVES BY PROVIDING SOCIAL AND EMOTIONAL DEVELOPMENT AND PROGRAMS THAT STRENGTHEN PHYSICAL HEALTH, AND UNITE COMMUNITIES BY ADVANCING DIVERSITY, EQUITY, AND COMMUNITY WELL-BEING.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE SANNEH FOUNDATION, A YOUTH DEVELOPMENT ORGANIZATION, PROVIDES LIFE SKILLS PROGRAMS FOR AT-RISK CHILDREN USING SOCCER AS THE CATALYST TO EMPOWER KIDS, IMPROVE LIVES AND UNITE COMMUNITIES.
IRS990.Desc: THE SANNEH FOUNDATION IMPLEMENTS AND MANAGES A NUMBER OF HOLISTIC YOUTH DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS WHOSE PURPOSE IS TO POSITIVELY TRANSFORM THE LIVES OF MINNESOTA'S DIVERSE YOUTH. CORE PROGRAMS INCLUDE: DREAMLINE, A HOLISTIC APPROACH TO STUDENT ACHIEVEMENT COMBINING TUTORING, MENTORING AND CLASSROOM SUPPORT TO IMPROVE SUCCESSFUL ACADEMIC OUTCOMES; FREE COMMUNITY CAMPS, A SPORTS BASED YOUTH DEVELOPMENT AND HEALTH INITIATIVE OF FREE WEEK-LONG DAY CAMPS DURING THE SUMMER SCHOOL RECESS; AND CONWAY CENTER, A SAINT PAUL RECREATION CENTER WHICH THE SANNEH FOUNDATION OPERATES AND MANAGES ON BEHALF OF THE CITY OF SAINT PAUL. IN-KIND SERVICES OF 390,715 ARE NOT INCLUDED IN THE EXPENSES LISTED ABOVE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LOBBYING ACTIVITIES WERE RELATED TO PROMOTING THE DREAMLINE PROGAM TO GET MORE MINNESOTA APPORTIONED FUNDS.

THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES PURSUANT TO SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE FOUNDATION'S FEDERAL INFORMATION RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO POSSIBLE EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE UNTIL THE EXPIRATION OF THE RELATED STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS, WHICH GENERALLY IS THREE YEARS. THE FOUNDATION HAS EVALUATED UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND MANAGEMENT HAS EXPRESSED THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JULY 31, 2018.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE F, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 3

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROGRAM SERVICES INCLUDE EDUCATION, HEALTH AND WELLNESS THROUGH SOCCER AND SPORTS.
DELOREZ HOULE ANTHONY SANNEH BOARD MEMBER CEO PARENT
FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO EACH BOARD MEMBER PRIOR TO FILING.
CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURES ARE UPDATED ANNUALLY FOR ALL BOARD MEMBERS AND STAFF. COPIES ARE KEPT WITH THE HUMAN RESOURCE DOCUMENTATION.

THE SANNEH FOUNDATION BOARD OF DIRECTORS USE THE MN COUNCIL OF NONPROFITS SALARY SURVEY AND OTHER SALARY SURVEYS FOR SIMILAR POSITIONS, BOTH NATIONALLY AND LOCALLY, FOR EVALUATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION. ADDITIONALLY, PERFORMANCE CRITERIAL IS ESTABLISHED ANNUALLY AND GOALS ARE REVIEWED. COMPENSATION IS HEAVILY WEIGHTED ON ACHIEVEMENT OF ORGANIZATIONAL GOALS.

THE SANNEH FOUNDATION BOARD OF DIRECTORS USE THE MN COUNCIL OF NONPROFITS SALARY SURVEY AND OTHER SALARY SURVEYS FOR SIMILAR POSITIONS, BOTH NATIONALLY AND LOCALLY, FOR EVALUATION OF COMPENSATION. ADDITIONALLY, PERFORMANCE CRITERIAL IS ESTABLISHED ANNUALLY AND GOALS ARE REVIEWED. COMPENSATION IS HEAVILY WEIGHTED ON ACHIEVEMENT OF ORGANIZATIONAL GOALS.
